docblock.description: Expose libraty functions to REST API.
Lists the properties contained in this class.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Array of properties whith type and default value

docblock.description: Get the values for the specified properties of a Quiz.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id from Quiz

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of property names to get values from

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns array of [property => value] pairs, or false if error. If a property does not exist, the returned array will show null as that propertie's value.

docblock.description: Set values to specified properties of a Quiz.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id from Quiz

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of properties to set values into

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of associated values to set into properties

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns true if success, false if error

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If count(prop_array) != count(value_array)

docblock.description: Create a new ClipitQuiz instance, and save it into the system.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the Quiz

tag.name: param
tag.description: Target interface to present Quiz (web space, large display, etc.)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Quiz full description (optional)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether the Quiz can be reused by other teachers (true= yes, false= no)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of ClipitQuizQuestions contained in this Quiz

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of ClipitQuizResults submitted to answer the Quiz Questions

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id of the Taxonomy referenced by this Quiz

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns the new Quiz Id, or false if error

docblock.description: Delete a Quiz from the system.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If from the Quiz to delete

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if success, false if error

docblock.description: Get all quizzes from the system.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number of results to show, default= 0 [no limit] (default)

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an array of ClipitQuiz objects

docblock.description: Get Quizzes with Id contained in a given list.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of Quiz Ids

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an array of ClipitQuiz objects

docblock.description: Adds Quiz Questions to a Quiz.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id from Quiz to add Questions to

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of Questions to add

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns true if success, false if error

docblock.description: Adds Quiz Results to a Quiz.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id from Quiz to add Results to

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of Results to add

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns true if success, false if error

docblock.description: Create a new ClipitQuizQuestion instance, and save it into the system.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Question in text form to be presented to the user taking the quiz

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of options presented to the user to choose from

tag.name: param
tag.description: Type of answer to be given (select 1 only, select 2, select any...)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of tags linking the question to the taxonomy (optional)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id of video to which the question relates to (optional)

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns the new Quiz Question Id, or false if error

docblock.description: Delete a Quiz Question from the system.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id from the Quiz Question to delete

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if success, false if error

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if success, false if error

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number of results to show, default= 0 [no limit] (default)

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an array of ClipitQuizQuestion objects

docblock.description: Get all Quiz Questions from a specified Quiz.

tag.name: param

tag.name: return

docblock.description: Class ClipitQuiz

tag.name: const
tag.description: string Subtype of the ClipitQuiz class for ElggObject

tag.name: var
tag.description: Unique Id of saved ClipitQuiz (-1 = unsaved)

tag.name: var
tag.description: Quiz name

tag.name: var
tag.description: Target interface for Quiz display (e.g.: "web space", "large display"...)

tag.name: var
tag.description: Quiz description free text (optional)

tag.name: var
tag.description: Specifies whether the Quiz can be reused by other teachers (optional, default = false)

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array of ClipitQuizQuestion ids (int) included in this Quiz

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array of ClipitQuizResult ids (int) included in this Quiz

tag.name: var
tag.description: Taxonomy used as topic for this Quiz

docblock.description: ClipitQuiz constructor

tag.name: param
tag.description: If $id is null then create new instance, else load instance with id = $id.

docblock.description: Loads a ClipitQuiz from the system.

tag.name: param
tag.description: IF of the ClipitQuiz to load from the system.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns ClipitQuiz instance, or false if error.

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Saves this instance to the system.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns id of saved instance, or false if error.

docblock.description: Deletes a quiz from the system.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if success, false if error.

docblock.description: Initialization method which loads objects, libraries, exposes the REST API, and registers test classes.
Loads clipit classes.
Loads clipit libraries.
Exposes the REST API
Method which runs and collects results for PHP Unit tests.
